p: To determine molecular interactions and stress responsive mechanisms in quinoa during CMV infection, transcriptome and small RNA sequencing were performed. In transcriptome sequencing, a total of 1.182 billion raw reads was generated. After removing low quality reads and adapters, trimmed sequences (1.131 B) were mapped to C. quinoa reference transcripts [ 4] with an average successful alignment percentage rate of 90.17 ( S2 Table). To eliminate the effect of sequence length and coverage depth of samples, mapped reads were normalized to TPM values for use in downstream analyses.
